entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
